name: Second Chances [demo]
description:
Second Chances Demo was created in less than a month for the 2020 Yaoi Game Jam.  It's only a short demo as I started quite late.  

This is based on the Omegaverse, this game requires previous knowledge of it. If you require a guide or any info about it in case you can't quite understand, make sure to ask me in the comments and I'll make a guide and upload it!  

Story

After a bad breakup that ended up in Andrew not wanting a relationship anymore, he devoted his life to his job. After years of dealing with the pain, he's learning how to move on with his life... that is, until 'that' happens. Will Andrew be able to move on and be happy once again? 

Take control of Andrew Williams, a lonely Alpha whose only joy in life is working in a daycare alongside his coworker, as he learns how to love again while navigating the hardship of relationships once again. Will he fall in love with his beta coworker? or, perhaps... the newly met Alpha CEO?

Features
  • As it is now, Second Chances has around 4k words of content
  • Final game will have 2 beautiful love interests ,  an alpha and a beta. 
  • No wrong choices!
  • 2 endings for each love interest: A platonic one and a romantic one. 
Future Plans

Within the next month: September, I'll be uploading an even better demo, with CGs and the first chapter completed, alongside a customized GUI as I'm learning how to do it!  It will be around 10-15k words of content.

Credits

Backgrounds: This site, Shijimi's recommendation, This one (for the sky)

Make sure to follow me on my Tumblr as I'll be making frequent updates on my progress in case you wanted to know. Well, more frequent than in Itch.io where I'll be posting only when anything major is done. 

Please tell me of any bugs or typos that you may come across as I am only but one person doing everything. My first language is Spanish so please also tell me if anything you may find is word weirdly. Thank you and enjoy this short demo!
